"Design a vaccine that uses artificial intelligence to predict and identify potential new diseases before they emerge."
"Create a vaccine that is personalized based on an individual's genetic makeup."
"Develop a vaccine that targets not just the virus itself, but also the cells that support its growth."
"Create a vaccine that uses nanotechnology to deliver the vaccine directly to infected cells."
"Develop a vaccine that uses CRISPR gene editing technology to modify the immune system's response to the virus."
